boardgame.name: The Downfall of Pompeii
La Noche que Cayó Pompeya
Der Untergang von Pompeji
Zagłada Pompei
龐貝城的隕落
boardgame.description: The year is AD 79. Pompeii, sitting at the foot of Vesuvius, is at the high point in its development. People come to the city from far and wide to try to make their luck in the city. So far nobody has dreamed of the danger that will bury all of their dreams under mountains of ash just ten years later. Who will survive the eruption of Vesuvius unscathed?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The simple rules make it easy to get started with The Downfall of Pompeii, a game in which a lot of tactical know-how is required _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; along with a little luck _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; in order to bring your pieces out of the city at the right time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game falls into two halves: before and after the eruption of Vesuvius. Before the eruption, players play cards to place their pieces in buildings. After the first eruption, they can also place as many relatives as the number of pieces already in the building they placed their piece in. When Omen cards are drawn, the player can take any opponent's piece and throw it into the erupting volcano. In this manner, players try to get as many pieces onto the board as close to the exits from the city as possible._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After the second eruption, the game changes. Now each player places a lava tile, which kills any pieces on that square and may block exits from the city. Then they move two pieces toward the exits, moving them a number of squares equal to the pieces on the square from which they started. The player who gets the most pieces out of the city wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The 2013 second edition of The Downfall of Pompeii includes three dual vent tiles and a new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Dual Vent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; variant._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: never played +++++ german version, but game parts are language independent and you can find rules translations here on boardgamegeek +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia and australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have no euro : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : direct bank transfer (wich is cost-free !) or cash (by letter) +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped or what´s it´s weight), pleask at for prices, befor you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros

Amigo Games (ASI 5771) In the year 79 A.D., the beautiful city of Pompeii sits at the foot of Mount Vesuvius. For years, the lovely town has attracted the best of Rome_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s citizens, and it is famous for both its businesses and luxuries. But a terrible secret lies deep beneath the slopes of the mighty mountain. A secret that will unleash unspeakable horrors on the fateful afternoon of August 24th... Come to beautiful Pompeii with this exciting game! You will use cards to attract your Roman friends and relatives to the town. But hidden in the deck is the dreaded Vesuvius card! Once this card is drawn, the volcano will erupt, raining fire onto the unsuspecting city! Now you must struggle to escape the doomed city, rushing to avoid the constant streams of lave that threaten to engulf your people! Will you be able to save them all? The player with the most survivors will be the winner! Contains: 140 Citizen Playing Pieces in 4 colors 53 Pompeii Cards 7 Omen Cards 2 A.D. 79 Cards 45 Lava Tiles bearing 6 symbols 1 Volcano 1 Cloth Bag 1 Game Board

Brand new and factory sealed! Gamers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Inn is a real store in Mesa AZ, and will ship via DHL Ground or the USPS. Most games will ship for $7.50 unless it is particularly light or heavy, or if you request Priority or special handling. Insurance is available on all orders for about $2. All games can ship international, and we will quote costs upon request. Delivery confirmation goes with every order. We do our best to give an accurate description of condition, and will ship them safely and quickly, and we will gladly combine shipping costs. In store pickup _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; payment is available with no shipping or handling charges. Arizona residents must pay 7.5% sales tax. KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. THE DOWNFALL OF POMPEII: $36.00 Mayfair Games Availability: [IN STOCK|DIRECT ORDER|PRE-ORDER] PRE-ORDER - Game not yet released or awaiting reprint IN STOCK - ready to ship DIRECT ORDER - In stock at supplier. We will include the game in our next order from our supplier* *Next order date - to see our next order date click onthe _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link. If the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link is not visible, click on the user ID _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;kkrieger_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; to view our _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;geekstore_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;, then click on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link for a specific game. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com
